name: Polo G
description:
'''Taurus Tremani Bartlett''' (born January 6, 1999), known professionally as '''Polo G''', is an American rapper. He rose to prominence with his singles "[[Finer Things (Polo G song)|Finer Things]]" and "[[Pop Out]]" (featuring [[Lil Tjay]]). His debut album ''[[Die a Legend]]'' (2019) peaked at number six on the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] and was certified [[Music recording certification|double platinum]] by the [[Recording Industry Association of America|RIAA]], a feat matched by his two subsequent albums.

Bartlett's second studio album, ''[[The Goat (album)|The Goat]]'' (2020), peaked at number two on the ''Billboard'' 200 and contained ten songs which charted on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] chart. His third studio album, ''[[Hall of Fame (Polo G album)|Hall of Fame]]'' (2021), was met with continued success as it became Bartlett's first chart-topping album, also spawning his first number-one single, "[[Rapstar]]".
